content: Interested in becoming an MTL can anyone shed some light on the process? I know its a 2 week course at Lackland just need to get a POC or number to call Thanks in advance All contacts must be made through the profile page. title: Any MTL's out there?

content: Sounds like you're looking for something "Air Force", but assuming everyone would have a clue as to what MLT (Military Training Leader) might be is quite a stretch - - Might try here: http://forums.military.com/eve/forums/a/frm/f/37919558 Wandering and Wondering
